name: simd_double2x4
desc: A matrix of two columns and four rows that contains double-precision values.

items.name: init()
items.desc: Creates a new matrix.

items.name: init(Double)
items.desc: Creates a new matrix with the specified scalar value on the main diagonal.

items.name: init(diagonal: SIMD2<Double>)
items.desc: Creates a new matrix with the specified vector on the main diagonal.

items.name: init([SIMD4<Double>])
items.desc: Creates a new matrix from an array.

items.name: init(SIMD4<Double>, SIMD4<Double>)
items.desc: Creates a new matrix with the specified vectors as columns.

items.name: init(columns: (simd_double4, simd_double4))
items.desc: Creates a new matrix with the specified columns.

items.name: init(rows: [SIMD2<Double>])
items.desc: Creates a new matrix with the specified rows.

items.name: var transpose: double4x2
items.desc: The transpose of the matrix.

items.name: var columns: (simd_double4, simd_double4)
items.desc: The columns of the matrix.

items.name: var debugDescription: String
items.desc: A representation of the matrix that is suitable for debugging.

items.name: func simd_matrix(simd_double4, simd_double4) -> simd_double2x4
items.desc: Returns a new matrix with the specified columns.

items.name: func simd_matrix_from_rows(simd_double2, simd_double2, simd_double2, simd_double2) -> simd_double2x4
items.desc: Returns a new matrix with the specified rows.

items.name: func matrix_from_rows(SIMD2<Double>, SIMD2<Double>, SIMD2<Double>, SIMD2<Double>) -> simd_double2x4
items.desc: Returns a new matrix with the specified rows.

items.name: func simd_add(simd_double2x4, simd_double2x4) -> simd_double2x4
items.desc: Returns the sum of two matrices.

items.name: func simd_sub(simd_double2x4, simd_double2x4) -> simd_double2x4
items.desc: Returns the difference of two matrices.

items.name: func matrix_scale(Double, simd_double2x4) -> simd_double2x4
items.desc: Returns the product of a scalar value and a matrix.

items.name: func simd_mul(Double, simd_double2x4) -> simd_double2x4
items.desc: Returns the product of a scalar value and a 2 x 4 matrix.

items.name: func simd_mul(simd_double4, simd_double2x4) -> simd_double2
items.desc: Returns the product of a four-element vector and a 2 x 4 matrix.

items.name: func matrix_multiply(simd_double4, simd_double2x4) -> simd_double2
items.desc: Returns the product of a four-element vector and a 2 x 4 matrix.

items.name: func simd_mul(simd_double2x4, simd_double2) -> simd_double4
items.desc: Returns the product of a 2 x 4 matrix and a two-element vector.

items.name: func matrix_multiply(simd_double2x4, simd_double2) -> simd_double4
items.desc: Returns the product of a 2 x 4 matrix and a two-element vector.

items.name: func simd_mul(simd_double2x4, simd_double2x2) -> simd_double2x4
items.desc: Returns the product of a 2 x 4 matrix and a 2 x 2 matrix.

items.name: func matrix_multiply(simd_double2x4, simd_double2x2) -> simd_double2x4
items.desc: Returns the product of a 2 x 4 matrix and a 2 x 2 matrix.

items.name: func simd_mul(simd_double3x4, simd_double2x3) -> simd_double2x4
items.desc: Returns the product of a 3 x 4 matrix and a 2 x 3 matrix.

items.name: func matrix_multiply(simd_double3x4, simd_double2x3) -> simd_double2x4
items.desc: Returns the product of a 3 x 4 matrix and a 2 x 3 matrix.

items.name: func simd_mul(simd_double4x4, simd_double2x4) -> simd_double2x4
items.desc: Returns the product of a 4 x 4 matrix and a 2 x 4 matrix.

items.name: func matrix_multiply(simd_double4x4, simd_double2x4) -> simd_double2x4
items.desc: Returns the product of a 4 x 4 matrix and a 2 x 4 matrix.

items.name: func simd_equal(simd_double2x4, simd_double2x4) -> simd_bool
items.desc: Returns true if every element in a matrix is exactly equal to the corresponding element in a second matrix.

items.name: func simd_almost_equal_elements(simd_double2x4, simd_double2x4, Double) -> simd_bool
items.desc: Returns true if every element in a matrix is within a specified tolerance to the corresponding element in a second matrix.

items.name: func simd_almost_equal_elements_relative(simd_double2x4, simd_double2x4, Double) -> simd_bool
items.desc: Returns true if every element in a matrix is within a specified double-precision relative tolerance to the corresponding element in a second matrix.

items.name: func simd_linear_combination(Double, simd_double2x4, Double, simd_double2x4) -> simd_double2x4
subscript(Int) -> SIMD4<Double>
items.desc: Accesses the column at the specified position.

items.name: subscript(Int, Int) -> Double
items.desc: Accesses the element at the specified position.

items.name: typealias double2x4
items.desc: A type alias for a double-precision 2 x 4 matrix.

items.name: typealias matrix_double2x4
items.desc: A type alias for a double-precision 2 x 4 matrix.
